answers.author: Kenneth Decker
answers.text:
From the ICMA home page, go to the "members" tab.  The blue drop down box has two columns.  About two-thirds down the right-hand column is the credentialing section.  Here's a "cut-and-paste" of the basic answer:
■Verify that you are eligible. Your work experience must be full-time and appointed, and your degree must be from a regionally accredited university.
 ■Complete the Applied Knowledge Assessment and receive results. Your Applied Knowledge Assessment results must be less than three years old to make initial application.
 ■Submit application before deadline based on assessment results.
Credentialiing is worth the effort.  Good luck.
